summary.span: 表示一个三维矩形：例如立方体。

span.span: Represents a 3-D rectangle: for example, a cube.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义为 () 和大小结构 () 的位置 。 is defined as a location () and a size structure (). 由于 为大小指定的、和值是度而不是坐标，因此，除了在空矩形情况下，它们都不能为负。Because the , , and values specified for the size are magnitudes and not coordinates, they cannot be negative except in the case of an empty rectangle. 空矩形由指定， 其 值为 -无限大。An empty rectangle is specified by , which has , , and values of -Infinity. 此结构通常用于表示或的界限 。This structure is typically used to represent the bounds of a or . 和 通常不在 XAML 中使用，因为在使用这些类型的 WPF 3d 对象模型中不存在可设置的属性。 and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回一个空 值，其 X、Y 和 Z 值为正无穷大，其大小值为负无穷大。This property returns an empty whose X, Y, and Z values are positive-infinity and whose size values are negative infinity. 在这种情况下，大小值可以为负数。This is the only situation in which size values can be negative. 通常用于表示或的界限 。 is typically used to represent the bounds of a or .

span.span: Gets or sets a that represents the origin of the .

value.span: 表示 原点的 ，该原点通常位于后侧左下角。

span.span: that represents the origin of the , typically the back bottom left corner.
The default value is (0,0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，在3-d 坐标系统中，Y 轴向上 (，假定相机的 属性为正) 。Note that in the 3-D coordinate system, the positive Y axis points up (assuming that the camera's property is positive). 因此，此属性通常表示 在场景中的左下角。Therefore, this property usually represents the back bottom left corner of the in the scene. 通常用于表示或的界限 。 is typically used to represent the bounds of a or . 和 通常不在 XAML 中使用，因为在使用这些类型的 WPF 3d 对象模型中不存在可设置的属性。 and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常用于表示或的界限 。 is typically used to represent the bounds of a or . 请注意， 仅当可以 直接更改、和属性时，调用方法才会起作用 。Note that calling the method will only have an effect if you can change the , , and properties directly. 由于 是一个值类型，因此，如果 使用属性或索引器引用对象，则会获得对象的副本，而不是对对象的引用。Because is a value type, if you reference a object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object. 如果尝试对 属性或索引器引用更改、或，则会发生编译器错误。If you attempt to change , , or on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs. 同样， 对属性或索引器调用将不会更改基础对象。Similarly, calling on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object. 如果要更改被 引用为属性或索引器的的值，请创建新的 ，修改其字段，然后将 返回回属性或索引器。If you want to change the value of a that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new , modify its fields, and then assign the back to the property or indexer.
